headline.main: GETTING READY FOR THE MARKET OF THE AMERICAS

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt will open next Friday the Market of the Americas at 484 Park Avenue, where a comprehensive assortment of art objects, antiques and curios will be sold for the benefit of Bundles for Britain.
abstract: To give piano concerts in U S, por
